title: My account was hacked
body: I have not played league of legends in a long time and I got on the other day and it said my account was hacked my name is "killingcrimson" please I would like to change my password as well please email costalotos@outlook.com

replies.body:
Hey there,


Sorry to hear your account was compromised. Please follow all of the steps below to regain control of your League of Legends account and reverse any unwanted actions that the individual who compromised your account may have taken:
 
 
1. Run a complete anti-virus scan on your computer and remove any malware that is detected. If you don't have an anti-virus program, I recommend downloading either [**MalwareBytes Free**](https://www.malwarebytes.org/mwb-download/) or [**ESET NOD32 with a free 30 day trial**](http://download.eset.com/special/live-installer/us/eset_nod32_antivirus_live_installer.exe). Either or should be able to get the job done. 
2. Once the scans have run and any detections are removed, change any accounts/passwords that you believe may have been compromised. This may include your email account(s), League of Legends account (if you still have access to it; if not, skip to the "Submitting a ticket" step), and Riot Games Player Support account if you already have one. You can change your League of Legends password by going to the [**League of Legends account area**](https://account.leagueoflegends.com/na/en/protect) in the top-right corner of this page. Click on your summoner name, and select "Settings". In the box that comes up, click "Change Password" and follow said steps. (Make sure that your email account is secure before doing this step, as a confirmation email will be sent to the corresponding email account.)
3. Now that your accounts are secure, it's time to contact Riot Games Player Support to deal with the unauthorized actions on your account and/or recovering your account. 


To contact Riot Games Player Support, you'll need to [**submit a ticket on the Riot Games Support website**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us). In the ticket, please submit the following information along with whatever information you can provide about your situation: 
**[NOTE: DO NOT POST THIS INFORMATION ON THE BOARDS. SUBMIT THEM IN A TICKET!]**
>Summoner Name (the name your friends see in-game):
The server you play on:
When was the last time that you had access to the account (Month/Day/Year):
Creation date of the account (Month and Year):
Original email address used to register the account:
Location where you registered the account (City and Country):
List of locations that you have played on this account(City and Country):
Last IP address used to play League of Legends - http://whatsmyip.net/
Internet Service Provider (ISP)/Internet Carrier when registering the account:
Other people who have ever had access to the account:
How did you first come into possession of the account:
If Applicable:
Approximate dates of most recent RP purchases:
Email address linked to PayPal account:
Unique PayPal transaction IDs associated with purchase(s):
Phone number(s), mobile provider, and country used for SMS transactions:
Any PaySafe Card PIN/Transaction IDs:
Any Prepaid RP card PINs:
The last 4 digits and expiration date of any credit card(s) used to purchase RP:
Any transaction or confirmation numbers received via email for this account:


Lastly, to increase your chances of a quick resolution to your request, follow the tips below the best that you can:

1. Be sure to submit as much information in your initial ticket as possible. For obvious reasons, each Player Support Specialist's request for more information will delay the resolution of the issue.
2. Be respectful and polite in your correspondences with Riot Support. (They're doing their best to help you!)
3. Try not create a new ticket or respond to an existing ticket before a Player Support Specialist has had the chance to review your request. New tickets/replies may bump your ticket back to the bottom of the queue, thus increasing the amount of time before a Player Support Specialist is able to review your ticket.  


I know that there are quite a bit of steps listed above, so if you have any questions, please don't hesitate to ask. Best of luck!
